message.raw:
Steve, you are right, we have compiled [gazebo5](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo5-debbuilder-docker/3/) on ARM. @opoplawski the problem is that you are trying to compile gazebo4 which probably lacks of the fixes to compile on ARM, that landed in Gazebo during the gazebo5 development cycle. I would recommend to go with gazebo 5.1.0 if possible.

If you need to make a backport, please check pull request #911, in particular [this patch](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/911/fixes-to-compile-gazebo-in-the-arm/diff#Lgazebo/gui/qtpropertybrowser/CMakeLists.txtT29).
message.html:
Steve, you are right, we have compiled gazebo5 on ARM. @opoplawski the problem is that you are trying to compile gazebo4 which probably lacks of the fixes to compile on ARM, that landed in Gazebo during the gazebo5 development cycle. I would recommend to go with gazebo 5.1.0 if possible.

If you need to make a backport, please check pull request #911, in particular this patch.
